creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: five little critters arranged in a V at center with pointed faces, black legs, and grey bodies with wispy lines coming off ends; crabs with large claws and black legs at LR; short inscription along R edge with two part oval relief stamp at LR; gold border, mounted on white board
title: Crabs and Tortoises
